name: file_uploader
description: This is a backend express web application that intends to allows users to store personal and private files and create shareable public links for specific folders or files across the internet.

scripts.build:client: npm install && cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:server: npm install && cd server && npm install && tsc
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build-and-start: npm run build && npm run start:server
